dublin_core.dcvalue: The advent of telemedicine poses new legal challenges for Canada s health care system Although telemedicine increases access it does not fit easily into Canada s traditional one tier approach to health care Cross border telemedicine services may inadvertently contribute to a two tier system The current legal system will have to be adapted to accommodate changes instigated by cross border telemedicine
Legal issues relating to telemedicine in Canada's publicly funded health-care system.
